entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as lowering his wand and causing someone to scream.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who hits the ground and awakens with a burning scar after Voldemort's spell is cast.

relationships.description: Voldemort's spell causes Harry to hit the ground and awaken with a burning scar, indicating that Voldemort is causing harm or pain to Harry.
